name: framerx
description: Provides bundled react components for FramerX

scripts.sync:lib: zip -d react-frontend-developer.framerx lib/* && zip -ur react-frontend-developer.framerx lib
scripts.sync:framerx: cp _base.framerx react-frontend-developer.framerx && zip -ur react-frontend-developer.framerx lib/* && cd src/ && zip -ur ../react-frontend-developer.framerx code/* design/* && cd ..

author: Marcin Czenko
